name: HWBG B4K Enhanced
description:
B4K Forever!

For removing the first tab in navigation, see my other style.
additional_info:
v0.84b WIP.


-------------------------------------------
[v0.84b]
  - Update to HTTPS url prefix

[v0.84a]
  - Set body min-width to auto

[v0.84]
  - Some fixes for tabs and upload dialog

[v0.83]
  - Several fixes after recent forum software update

[v0.82]
  - Enabled sidebar for blogs and fixed its styles

[v0.81]
  - Changed main navigation colors

[v0.8]
  - Removed main gradients and adjusted colors
  - Fixed bug in author's label and pagination when thread icons are displayed [original hwbg code bug]
  - Removed ad in header for users without adblock+ plugin
  * Please use HWBG theme as a base, HWBG B4K Enhanced covers only changes in the default theme

[v0.72]
  - Several fixes

[v0.71]
  - Fixed background color of textarea, input and select fields

[v0.7]
  - Advanced Reply
  - Smileys
  - File Manager
  - New style buttons fixes
  - Rating system colors

[v0.62]
  - Error message styling

[v0.61]
  - Fixes to subforums

[v0.6]
  - Basic styling for Archive & PDA views
  - Fixed front page after change in original hwbg code (smaller thread status icons)

[v0.5]
  - Fixed search results
